name: Cheese Potatoes in Foil
author: C. Allen Collier

ingredients.name: large baking potatoes, pared cracked or coarsely ground

instructions: Slice potatoes onto a large piece of foil. Sprinkle with pepper and salt. Crumble bacon over potatoes. Add onion and cheese. Dot with butter. Wrap loosely and seal well with double fold. Cook in 350Â° oven for about 1 hour or until done, turning occasionally.
